summary: "Conan the Barbarian" is a 1982 American action movie directed by John Milius. It's about a warrior, Conan (Arnold Schwarzenegger), who wants to avenge his parents' death. The film is based on Robert E. Howard's character and took years to make. Shot in Spain, it combined elements from various stories and Japanese films. Despite mixed reviews, it was a hit, making over $69 million. It launched Schwarzenegger's career and became a cult classic, leading to a sequel and a 2011 reboot.
title: Conan the Barbarian (1982 film)
